name: Believe
description:
Believe is a short First-Person Exploration game with Puzzle and Adventure elements set in a religious temple that managed to house various world religions together in peace and harmony. It's up to you to take on the role of an archeologist and unlock this temple's secrets!

This game was made by two students as our bachelor's degree project and was realized entirely in one semester.

KEY FEATURES

  • Non-linear Escape Room style puzzles
  • Point-and-Click Adventure style item and inventory management
  • Professionally composed and by actual religious music inspired soundtrack featuring a professional women's choir
  • Two different endings to choose from
